snippet: William R. Loomis Jr., a former chief executive of Lazard, has returned to the firm as a senior adviser, about a decade after stepping down as the investment bank's leader.
abstract: William R. Loomis Jr., a former chief executive of Lazard, has returned to the firm as a senior adviser, about a decade after stepping down as the investment bank's leader.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Quietly, Lazard's Ex-C.E.O. Returns to the Firm
